body_html: My guess is this is caused by vectorisation kicking in as batch size changes. Vectorisation code, esp if fast math is enabled, can have some effect on precision. Reopen if it greatly affects your model performance.
body_text: My guess is this is caused by vectorisation kicking in as batch size changes. Vectorisation code, esp if fast math is enabled, can have some effect on precision.  Reopen if it greatly affects your model performance.
